thread-pool.alt: A thread pool where tasks queue up and threads execute tasks.

token-bucket.alt: Token bucket with tokens arriving and packets passing when enough tokens exist.

dns-iterative-resolver.alt: Resolver queries root, TLD, and authoritative servers to resolve a domain.

merkle-tree.alt: Merkle tree of blocks with hashes up to a root hash.

primary-backup.alt: Primary sends updates to backup and acknowledges to client.

threat-model.alt: Diagram connecting threats, vulnerabilities, exploits, controls, and assets.

custom-event-loop.alt: Event loop: wait for readiness, handle events, repeat.

custom-wal.alt: Append log before applying state; checkpoint to compact; recover by replay.

custom-slo.alt: Error budget decreases with bad events; burn rate indicates urgency.

custom-offline-bundle.alt: Package contains document, signature, proofs, and log checkpoint for offline verify.
